seed_pair.target: Todo era mucho más fácil en el pasado.
seed_pair.known: It was all much easier in the past.

S0448: Sí van a estar contentos de ayudar.
Yes they'll be happy to help.
S0449: Ellos dijeron que estaban casi preparados.
They said that they were almost ready.
S0450: No ellos tienen que tomar el tren ellos mismos.
No they have to catch the train themselves.
S0451: Ellos dijeron lo que querían hacer.
They said what they wanted to do.
S0452: Ellos no dijeron lo que querían hacer.
They didn't say what they wanted to do.
S0453: Did they say who they saw last night?
S0454: Nuestros amigos vinieron como a las seis.
Our friends came round at about six o'clock.
S0455: Tuvimos que irnos porque los niños estaban cansados.
We had to leave because the children were tired.
S0456: Puede que esté allí pero no es muy probable.
He might be there but it's not very likely.
S0457: Parte del problema es el número de áreas diferentes.
Part of the problem is the number of different areas.
